title: Game Character Dark Strider
description: Embark on a treacherous journey into the depths of the netherworld and unleash the malevolent force that is the Dark Strider!
longDescription:
Audio demo


Behold, for within the realm of video games, we introduce you to Game Character Dark Strider. This auditory masterpiece encompasses over 320+ sinister male voice-over incantations.


  • 329 male voice-over audio files
  • 459 MB of voice samples
  • All in 16bit/44k .wav file format


The voice profile of the Dark Strider exudes a profound darkness, a deep resonance, and a warmth that transcends the mundane. Perfect for those nefarious NPCs, malevolent entities, dread bosses, dragonic overlords, brutish warriors, and all characters that beckon forth a tapestry of fantasy or a glimpse into the cosmic future. Should you desire to imbue it with eldritch vocal effects, fret not, for our voice is available in its pristine form, awaiting your sorcery. It stands as an invaluable asset for any sci-fi or fantasy opus, a sonic treasury filled with a plethora of vocalizations, ranging from the commonplace to the esoteric.

UCS Compliant


All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant and is organized into categories to make it super easy to navigate to the right sounds. With 329 voice over audio files and 123 custom dialogue lines such as “You’re Flesh Will Burn, Death Is All That You Will Find Here, & Fall To Your Knees”. This pack has plenty of options to help your game characters come to life. 


Game Character Dark Strider voice over sound effects is not only packed with high-quality voice recordings but includes thought out, cohesive scripted dialogue and vocalizations to help you build dynamic western stories, game trailers, in-game characters, dramatic moments and so much more. 


Product details:

  • 329 male voice-over audio files
  • 459 MB of voice samples
  • All in 16bit/44k .wav file format
  • Includes Soundminer Metadata
  • Universal Category System (UCS) compliant
  • Game Character Voice-Over Sound Effects Library
  • Perfect for brutes, game bosses, evil characters
  • 110 stock NPC dialogue lines
  • 123 custom character specific dialogue lines
  • 9 crying - sad, groan, regret, dying
  • 22 fighting vocals
  • 7 chanting lines
  • 7 breathing lines
  • 13 jumping sounds
  • 19 laughing sounds
  • 19 pain grunts and vocalizations
  • Works with any DAW or Game Engine
  • All Royalty Free & YouTube friendly
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
technicalDetails:

  •  329 male voice-over audio files
  • 459 MB of voice samples
  • All in 16bit/44k .wav file format
